committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services

official_title: A bill to amend section 7703 of title 5, United States Code, to strengthen the ability of the Office of Personnel Management to obtain judicial review to protect the merit system, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Allows the Director of the Office of Personnel Management to file a petition for judicial review of a final order or decision of the Merit Systems Protection Board within 60 days (currently, 30 days) after receiving notice thereof. Repeals a provision giving the Court of Appeals discretion for granting petitions for judicial review.
